column1: Several  issues  arise  from the letter marked  'Pi0' . The  first  is  that even  though
the  Secretary,  Ministry  of  Defence  has  been  named  as  a  Respondent  to  this

column2: application,  and  'Pi0'  is  a  document that  is  sought  to  be  quashed,  a  copy  of
the report of the Commander of the Sri  Lanka  Army referred to therein has  not
filed  of  record,  nor  has  any  material  been  adduced  to  explain  and/or
support the  matters  set  out therein. The  second  issue  is  that the  Respondents
